headline: TON blockchain network back online after brief outage
summary: Representatives for The Open Network (TON) said the outage was caused by an error in the masterchain dispatch queue and was resolved.

headline: Bitcoin could consolidate, but ETH, HYPE, TAO and QNT may resume their up move
summary: Bitcoin’s rise above $105,000 could improve sentiment, triggering a rally in ETH, HYPE, TAO, and QNT.

headline: AEON Integrates World Liberty Financial’s USD1 to Power Stablecoin Real-World Payments
summary: SINGAPORE, May 30, 2025 /PRNewswire/ — AEON, the next-generation crypto payment framework for intelligent commerce, has integrated USD1, the fiat-backed digital dollar developed by World Liberty Financial Inc. (WLFI), into its global payment ecosystem. This integration enables users to seamlessly pay with USD1 across both online and offline retail scenarios, furthering AEON’s mission to make stable, … Continue reading "AEON Integrates World Liberty Financial’s USD1 to Power Stablecoin Real-World Payments"

headline: Bitcoin traders target $100K and under as monthly close seals 11% gain
summary: Bitcoin traders eye the weekly close for cues as to where BTC price action may be headed next — but sub-$100,000 levels are already on their radar.

headline: The machine economy has arrived and bots have wallets
summary: Autonomous delivery robots are no longer just couriers. They’re economic actors with their own wallets, negotiating, earning and spending in real time. Bots have evolved from tools into agents, economic participants in their own right.

headline: Czech justice minister resigns over $45M Bitcoin gift from convict
summary: Czech Justice Minister Pavel Blazek resigned following backlash over his ministry’s sale of Bitcoin donated by a convicted criminal.

summary: French prosecutors charged 25 people over a wave of crypto-related kidnappings. However, the masterminds remain at large.

summary: According to PeckShield, 20 major crypto hacks were reported in May, resulting in total losses of $244.1 million.

headline: AI-powered OSINT tool profiles YouTube commenters, raising privacy concerns

headline: What are stablecoin-backed corporate cards and how do they work?

headline: Digital euro, not MiCA, key to manage crypto risks: Bank of Italy chief

headline: Thailand to block Bybit, OKX and other crypto exchanges on June 28
